SELECT c.id, c.sku, c.source_area, c.commodity_name, c.commodity_name_en, c.customer_id, c.category1_id, c.brand_id, cb.brand_name, cb.brand_name_en, c.sale_status, c.review_status, c.unit_code, c.platform_price, c.platform_currency, c.size_length, c.size_width, c.size_height, c.weight, c.net_url, c.declare_price, c.declare_currency, c.img_url, c.is_correspondence, c.texture_name, c.texture_name_en, c.color_name, c.color_name_en, c.spec_name, c.spec_name_en, c.use_way, c.use_way_en, c.hs_code, getCategoryChildId ( c.category1_id, c.category2_id, c.category3_id, c.category4_id, c.category5_id ) AS category1Id, getCategoryName (getCategoryChildId ( c.category1_id, c.category2_id, c.category3_id, c.category4_id, c.category5_id )) categoryName, getCategoryNameEn (getCategoryChildId ( c.category1_id, c.category2_id, c.category3_id, c.category4_id, c.category5_id )) categoryNameEn FROM commodity c LEFT JOIN commodity_brand cb ON c.brand_id = cb.id LEFT JOIN commodity_category cc ON cc.id = getCategoryChildId ( c.category1_id, c.category2_id, c.category3_id, c.category4_id, c.category5_id ) WHERE c.id = #{id}
and c.customer_id = #{customerId}

SELECT id, sku, commodity_name, commodity_name_en FROM commodity WHERE (sku = #{sku} or ( (commodity_name = #{commodityName}) or commodity_name_en = #{commodityNameEn}))
AND id != #{id}

SELECT id FROM commodity WHERE id = #{commodityId}
and customer_id = #{customerId}
